name: Space Maze (itch) (HamsterCode)
description:
You have detected valuable Gems inside asteroids! Now you must fly your ship through the mazes to collect them all!

**DEMO**

there are only 5 levels so far. This has been released to gather feedback and ideas.

If you have a suggestion or feature idea for the game, I would love to hear it!

CONTROLS-

WASD to move

space to interact with levers

esc - return to menu
